prompts.title: Customer Balance Lookup
prompts.description: Find a customer and show their current balance and recent transactions
prompts.content: Find customer "Acme Corp" and show me their current balance and recent transactions
usageExamples: Find customer 'ABC Company' and show balance
Get balance and transactions for customer ID 12345
prompts.longDescription: Use this MCP prompt to quickly retrieve customer financial information including current balance and transaction history. Works with Claude or ChatGPT when connected to NetSuite via MCP Standard Tools SuiteApp.

prompts.title: Sales Report by Customer
prompts.description: Generate a sales report for a specific time period grouped by customer
prompts.content: Generate a sales report for Q4 2024 grouped by customer
usageExamples: Generate sales report for last month grouped by customer
Show me sales by customer for January 2024
prompts.longDescription: Create comprehensive sales reports grouped by customer. Modify the date range and grouping options as needed for your analysis.

prompts.title: Low Stock Inventory Check
prompts.description: Check inventory levels for items below reorder point grouped by location
prompts.content: Check inventory levels for all items below reorder point and group by location
usageExamples: Show me all items that need reordering
Check inventory levels below reorder point for Main Warehouse
prompts.longDescription: Identify items that need reordering by checking current inventory levels against reorder points. Results are grouped by location for easy warehouse management.

prompts.title: Customer Search and Details
prompts.description: Search for customers and retrieve detailed information
prompts.content: Search for customers matching 'Acme' and show me their details including contact information and recent activity
usageExamples: Find customers with 'Tech' in the name
Search for all customers and show details
prompts.longDescription: Search for customers using partial name matching and retrieve comprehensive customer information including contact details and activity history.

prompts.title: SuiteQL Custom Query
prompts.description: Run a custom SuiteQL query to retrieve NetSuite data
prompts.content: Run a SuiteQL query to get all open sales orders created in the last 30 days with their customer names and total amounts
usageExamples: Query all customers with balance over $10,000
Get all items with quantity on hand less than 100
prompts.longDescription: Execute custom SuiteQL queries to retrieve specific NetSuite data. Only read-only queries are supported. Modify the query to match your data needs.

prompts.title: Financial Performance Summary
prompts.description: Generate a financial performance summary for a date range
prompts.content: Generate a financial performance summary for the last quarter
usageExamples: Show financial performance for last month
Generate performance summary for Q1 2024
prompts.longDescription: Get a high-level financial performance overview for any date range. Useful for executive reporting and quick financial health checks.

prompts.title: GL Account Mapping Guide
prompts.description: Map expense categories to appropriate NetSuite GL accounts
prompts.content:
You are a NetSuite accounting expert. I need to map these expense categories to NetSuite GL accounts:

[List your expense categories here]

Suggest appropriate account numbers and types following NetSuite best practices for a standard Chart of Accounts. Include:
- Account number recommendations
- Account type (Expense, Other Expense, etc.)
- Sub-account structure if needed
- Any special considerations
usageExamples: Map travel expenses, office supplies, and software subscriptions
Set up GL accounts for a new department
prompts.longDescription: Get expert guidance on mapping your business expense categories to NetSuite's Chart of Accounts structure. Ensures proper financial reporting and compliance.

prompts.title: Sales Order Workflow Builder
prompts.description: Build a Saved Search for open Sales Orders with specific criteria
prompts.content:
You are a NetSuite expert. Help me build a Saved Search that:
- Shows all open Sales Orders
- Groups by Customer
- Includes: Document Number, Date, Amount, Status
- Filters: Created in last 30 days
- Sorts by: Amount descending

Provide the exact criteria, columns, and formulas needed to create this Saved Search in NetSuite.
usageExamples: Create search for overdue sales orders
Build search for sales orders by sales rep
prompts.longDescription: Get step-by-step instructions for creating Saved Searches in NetSuite. Modify the criteria to match your specific reporting needs.

prompts.title: Inventory Reorder Point Calculator
prompts.description: Calculate optimal reorder points based on sales velocity and lead times
prompts.content:
You are a NetSuite inventory management expert. Help me calculate optimal reorder points for my inventory items.

Given:
- Average daily sales: [DAILY_SALES]
- Lead time in days: [LEAD_TIME]
- Safety stock days: [SAFETY_STOCK]
- Current on-hand quantity: [ON_HAND]

Calculate:
1. Reorder point quantity
2. Economic order quantity (EOQ) if applicable
3. Recommended reorder frequency
4. Expected stockout risk

Provide the calculations and explain how to set these values in NetSuite item records.
usageExamples: Calculate reorder points for fast-moving items
Optimize inventory levels for seasonal products
prompts.longDescription: Optimize your inventory management by calculating appropriate reorder points based on sales patterns and supplier lead times. Reduces stockouts and excess inventory.

prompts.title: Customer Segmentation Strategy
prompts.description: Develop a customer segmentation strategy using NetSuite CRM features
prompts.content:
You are a NetSuite CRM expert. Help me develop a customer segmentation strategy.

My business has:
- [NUMBER] customers
- Sales range: $[MIN] to $[MAX] per customer annually
- Industries: [LIST_INDUSTRIES]
- Customer lifecycle stages: [LIST_STAGES]

Provide:
1. Recommended customer segments
2. Custom fields needed in NetSuite
3. Saved Search criteria for each segment
4. Workflow automation opportunities
5. Reporting recommendations

Explain how to implement this segmentation in NetSuite.
usageExamples: Segment customers by revenue and industry
Create segments for customer lifecycle management
prompts.longDescription: Develop a comprehensive customer segmentation strategy that leverages NetSuite's CRM capabilities for targeted marketing and sales efforts.

prompts.title: SuiteScript Error Debugging
prompts.description: Debug SuiteScript errors and optimize script performance
prompts.content:
You are a NetSuite SuiteScript expert. Help me debug this SuiteScript error:

Error Message: [ERROR_MESSAGE]
Script Type: [SCRIPT_TYPE]
Script Context: [CONTEXT]

Please:
1. Identify the root cause
2. Explain why the error occurred
3. Provide a fix
4. Suggest best practices to prevent similar issues
5. Check for governance limit concerns
6. Optimize the script if possible

If you need more context, ask specific questions.
usageExamples: Debug governance limit errors
Fix record locking issues
Optimize search performance
prompts.longDescription: Get expert help debugging SuiteScript errors with detailed explanations, fixes, and optimization recommendations. Works for SuiteScript 1.0, 2.0, and 2.1.

prompts.title: Role and Permission Audit
prompts.description: Audit user roles and permissions for security compliance
prompts.content:
You are a NetSuite security expert. Help me audit user roles and permissions.

I need to:
1. Review role-based access controls
2. Identify excessive permissions
3. Verify principle of least privilege
4. Check for inactive users with access
5. Recommend role structure improvements

Current situation:
- Number of roles: [NUMBER]
- Number of users: [NUMBER]
- Concerns: [LIST_CONCERNS]

Provide:
- Security best practices
- Specific recommendations for my setup
- Step-by-step audit checklist
- Common permission pitfalls to avoid
usageExamples: Audit roles before compliance review
Identify users with excessive permissions
Restructure role hierarchy
prompts.longDescription: Comprehensive security audit guidance for NetSuite roles and permissions. Ensures compliance and follows security best practices.

prompts.title: Item Description Summary
prompts.description: Summarize product descriptions concisely for better readability
prompts.content: Summarize this product description in 50 words or less, highlighting key features and benefits.
prompts.longDescription: Use Text Enhance to quickly summarize long product descriptions into concise, readable summaries that highlight key features.

prompts.title: Professional Customer Note
prompts.description: Generate professional customer communication notes
prompts.content: Write a professional, friendly note to the customer about [TOPIC]. Keep it concise and include next steps if applicable.
prompts.longDescription: Create professional customer notes directly in NetSuite fields using Text Enhance. Perfect for customer communication and follow-ups.

prompts.title: Transaction Memo Generator
prompts.description: Generate clear transaction memos for accounting clarity
prompts.content: Create a clear, professional memo for this transaction that explains the purpose and key details in 2-3 sentences.
prompts.longDescription: Quickly generate clear transaction memos that improve accounting clarity and audit trail documentation.

prompts.title: Sales Order Note Generator
prompts.description: Generate professional notes for sales orders with customizable variables
prompts.content:
PREAMBLE:
You are a professional sales assistant creating order notes for NetSuite.

TEMPLATE:
Generate a professional note for sales order ${ORDER_NUMBER}:
- Customer: ${CUSTOMER_NAME}
- Order Date: ${ORDER_DATE}
- Items: ${ITEM_COUNT} items
- Total: $${ORDER_TOTAL}

Include:
1. Order confirmation details
2. Expected fulfillment timeline
3. Special instructions or notes
4. Next steps for customer

Write in a professional, friendly tone.
prompts.longDescription: Full Prompt Studio template for generating professional sales order notes. Includes preamble, template with variables, and optimized model settings.

prompts.title: Invoice Line Description Builder
prompts.description: Create detailed invoice line descriptions from item data
prompts.longDescription: Prompt Studio template for generating detailed invoice line descriptions with customizable variables and model settings.

prompts.title: Customer Email Template
prompts.description: Generate personalized customer emails with variable substitution
prompts.longDescription: Comprehensive Prompt Studio template for generating personalized customer emails with full variable support and model configuration.

prompts.title: Overdue Invoice Query
prompts.description: Query NetSuite Advisor for overdue invoices by customer
prompts.content: What invoices are overdue for customer [CUSTOMER_NAME]? Show me the invoice numbers, amounts, and days overdue.
prompts.longDescription: Use NetSuite Advisor to quickly find overdue invoices for a specific customer. Native chatbot responds with invoice details.

prompts.title: Inventory Level Check
prompts.description: Check current inventory levels for items below reorder point
prompts.content: Show me all inventory items that are below their reorder point. Include the item name, current quantity, reorder point, and location.
prompts.longDescription: Query NetSuite Advisor to identify items that need reordering. Perfect for inventory management and purchasing decisions.

prompts.title: Sales Performance Query
prompts.description: Get sales performance summary for a sales rep or period
prompts.content: What are the sales numbers for [SALES_REP] for [PERIOD]? Show total sales, number of orders, and average order value.
prompts.longDescription: Use NetSuite Advisor to quickly get sales performance metrics. Native chatbot provides instant answers without generating artifacts.

skills.title: NetSuite SuiteQL Helper
skills.description: Write and optimize SuiteQL queries for NetSuite data retrieval and analysis

metadata.name: netsuite-suiteql-helper
metadata.description: Write and optimize SuiteQL queries for NetSuite. Use when building reports, data exports, or analyzing NetSuite records.
metadata.author: netsuite-marketplace

skills.skillContent:
---
name: netsuite-suiteql-helper
description: Write and optimize SuiteQL queries for NetSuite. Use when building reports, data exports, or analyzing NetSuite records.
---

# NetSuite SuiteQL Helper

## Quick Reference

SuiteQL is NetSuite's SQL-like query language for accessing record data. Use SuiteQL when you need:
- Complex data joins across multiple record types
- Aggregations and calculations
- Performance-optimized queries
- Direct database access

## Common Patterns

### Customer Queries
```sql
SELECT customer.id, customer.entityid, customer.companyname, customer.balance
FROM customer
WHERE customer.balance > 10000
ORDER BY customer.balance DESC
```

### Transaction Queries
```sql
SELECT transaction.id, transaction.tranid, transaction.trandate, transaction.total
FROM transaction
WHERE transaction.type = 'SalesOrd'
  AND transaction.trandate >= '2024-01-01'
```

### Item/Inventory Queries
```sql
SELECT item.id, item.itemid, item.displayname, itemlocation.quantityonhand
FROM item
INNER JOIN itemlocation ON item.id = itemlocation.item
WHERE itemlocation.location = 1
  AND itemlocation.quantityonhand < item.reorderpoint
```

## MCP Integration

When using with NetSuite MCP tools, use `NetSuite:runCustomSuiteQL` to execute queries:

```
Run this SuiteQL query: SELECT * FROM customer WHERE balance > 10000
```

## Best Practices

- Always use read-only queries (no INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE)
- Include WHERE clauses to limit results
- Use proper JOINs instead of subqueries when possible
- Test queries in SuiteQL Query Tool first
- Be mindful of governance limits
- Use field IDs, not internal IDs in WHERE clauses

## Common Fields

- Customer: id, entityid, companyname, balance, email
- Transaction: id, tranid, trandate, type, total, status
- Item: id, itemid, displayname, baseprice
- ItemLocation: item, location, quantityonhand, reorderpoint

skills.title: NetSuite Saved Search Builder
skills.description: Build and optimize Saved Searches for reporting and workflows
skills.content: Saved Search creation and optimization guidance

metadata.name: netsuite-saved-search-builder
metadata.description: Build and optimize Saved Searches for reporting and workflows. Use when creating searches for reports, dashboards, or workflow criteria.
metadata.author: netsuite-marketplace

skills.skillContent:
---
name: netsuite-saved-search-builder
description: Build and optimize Saved Searches for reporting and workflows. Use when creating searches for reports, dashboards, or workflow criteria.
---

# NetSuite Saved Search Builder

## Search Types

- **Transaction**: Sales Orders, Invoices, Purchase Orders
- **Item**: Inventory items, assemblies
- **Customer**: Customer records
- **Employee**: Employee records
- **Custom Record**: Custom record types

## Common Criteria Patterns

### Date Ranges
```
Criteria: Date Field
Condition: Within
Period: Last 30 Days
```

### Status Filters
```
Criteria: Status
Condition: Any Of
Values: [Open, Pending Approval]
```

### Amount Ranges
```
Criteria: Amount
Condition: Greater Than
Value: 1000
```

## Column Selection

### Standard Columns
- Document Number (tranid)
- Date (trandate)
- Amount (amount)
- Status (status)
- Customer/Entity (entity)

### Formula Columns
```
Formula: CASE WHEN {amount} > 10000 THEN 'High Value' ELSE 'Standard' END
```

## Grouping and Summaries

- Group by: Customer, Date, Status
- Summary Type: Sum, Average, Count
- Summary Label: Custom labels for clarity

## Best Practices

- Use specific criteria to limit results
- Only include needed columns
- Test search performance
- Use formulas for calculated fields
- Set appropriate permissions
- Document search purpose

## Workflow Integration

Saved Searches can be used in:
- Workflow criteria
- Scheduled reports
- Dashboard portlets
- Email notifications
- Script criteria

skills.title: NetSuite Administration Guide
skills.description: Administrative guidance for NetSuite configuration and management
skills.content: NetSuite administration best practices and configuration guidance

metadata.name: netsuite-admin-guide
metadata.description: Administrative guidance for NetSuite configuration and management. Use when setting up system preferences, managing users, or configuring workflows.
metadata.author: netsuite-marketplace

skills.skillContent:
---
name: netsuite-admin-guide
description: Administrative guidance for NetSuite configuration and management. Use when setting up system preferences, managing users, or configuring workflows.
---

# NetSuite Administration Guide

## User Management

### Creating Users
1. Setup > Users/Roles > Manage Users
2. Click New
3. Enter user details
4. Assign role(s)
5. Set access restrictions if needed

### Role Configuration
- Assign appropriate permissions
- Use principle of least privilege
- Review role access regularly
- Create custom roles for specific needs

## System Preferences

### Company Information
- Setup > Company > Company Information
- Update address, phone, tax info
- Set fiscal year preferences

### General Preferences
- Setup > Company > General Preferences
- Configure date formats
- Set time zone
- Enable/disable features

## Custom Fields

### Creating Custom Fields
1. Customization > Forms > Transaction Form Types (or Record Types)
2. Select form to customize
3. Click Customize
4. Add field
5. Configure field properties

### Field Types
- Text, Number, Date, Checkbox
- List/Record (dropdown)
- Rich Text Editor
- File Upload

## Workflow Configuration

### Creating Workflows
1. Customization > Workflow > Workflows
2. Click New
3. Set trigger (Before Save, After Submit, etc.)
4. Add states and actions
5. Test in sandbox first

### Common Actions
- Set Field Value
- Send Email
- Create Record
- Change Status
- Show Message

## Best Practices

- Always test in sandbox
- Document all customizations
- Use change management process
- Review system logs regularly
- Keep documentation updated
- Train users on new features
- Monitor system performance
